name: AisleWise
0:
”Alexa Open Aisle Wise.”
”Alexa ask Aisle Wise to add milk.”
”Alexa tell Aisle Wise to add recipe Mexican Soup.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aisle wise
des:
At Home:
- Speak Items or Recipes onto your *store-smart* AisleWise shopping list.
- While cooking, have AisleWise read Recipe Ingredients or Instructions from your private recipe collection.

At the Store:
- For *any* store, your shopping list is arranged by real store aisles for easy 
 navigation through the store.

To use this skill from Alexa:
1). Visit https://aislewise.com to create an AisleWise account, and to select the grocery stores where you shop.
2). Return to this page in the Alexa app, click 'Enable', then enter your AisleWise username and password.
3). Add items to your list from Alexa, then bring up to AisleWise.com, and hit the sync button to see your items.

Happy Grocery Shopping!!!
